short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects profane/indecent images in the webpage and blurs them out. Doesn't access the user's data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detects profane/indecent images in the webpage and blurs them out. 
The Plugin runs Machine Learning models on both image and text to detect inappropriate images and blurs them out (Plugin is in beta mode and is not fully accurate)
